alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 1:49AM PST until December 02 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, with the highest amounts in the Upper Weiser River Basin. * WHERE...In Idaho, Upper Treasure Valley and Upper Weiser River zones. In Oregon, Baker County zone. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roads will be snow-covered or icy during this morning`s commuting period.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
